posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: deploy-hexo
posts.text: Hexo+gitee搭建博客1.搭建环境操作系统：macOS Big Sur，Version 11.2 芯片型号：Apple M1 2.搭建过程//方便上传图片。 图片调整大小： 将_config文件中post_asset_folder: true _config文件中（注意空格）： url: https://sultimer.gitee.io/blog：是gitee生成的地址，每次上传以后都需要在git pages中update； deploy: type: git repo: https://gitee.com/sultimer/blog.git branch: master gitee中项目名称不需要和用户名一致，但是github中要求二者必须一致，并且项目需要是公开的。 theme: Wikitten $ cd your-hexo-directory$ git clone https://github.com/zthxxx/hexo-theme-Wikitten.git themes/Wikitten然后按照该模板的readme操作 npm install https://github.com/7ym0n/hexo-asset-image –save npm install hexo-deployer-git –save 3.参考资料
